;

;In 1981, Chen Chong studied film production in the United States and directed his first film in 1998 "Heavenly Bath". ;(Photo courtesy of interviewee);

;

;As an actor, Chen Chong is well known, and as a director, Chen Chong is well known. few. Chen Chong is one of the three directors of the movie "Her in the World" to be released on September 9, 2022, the other two are Sylvia Chang and Li Shaohong. The film tells an emotional story under difficult circumstances, involving mother-in-law and daughter-in-law, couples and lovers.

;

;In May 2020, Chen Chong received a call from producer Dong Wenjie, hoping to invite several well-known female directors to jointly shoot a movie. She finally decided to tell the story of a pair of lovers separated in two places, "to explore the closest expression of the oldest theme of love."

;

;Like all previous works she directed, Chen Chong wrote the script herself. She repeatedly looked at the real photos taken by her colleagues. There was a supermarket scene in the movie, so she found many supermarket CCTVs and watched them, wanting to know details such as the denseness of the crowds. The script was originally written to rain, and the rendering of rain was used to increase the atmosphere, but later she learned that there was no rain in reality on the day set in the movie, so she removed this setting.

;

;"Without the rain, wouldn't the story have happened? Wouldn't the feelings be conveyed? So, whether there is rain or not is not important, but whether there is the conveyance of emotions is important." She said.

;

;"Her in the World" was originally scheduled to be released on the May Day holiday in 2021, but was later postponed to the Mid-Autumn Festival in 2022. During the editing of the film, a Southern Weekend staff writer interviewed Chen Chong in Shanghai.

;

;"Love and loss are eternal"

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;The setting of this movie sounds a bit like Love in the Time of Cholera. When you were approaching this story, did you have a clear setting from the beginning? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;After receiving the invitation from the producer, I searched online for a week and finally found this story about lovers who were exiled in two places. Touched me. The girl returned to Beijing to visit her parents during the Spring Festival, but she has not been able to see her boyfriend who was locked down in Wuhan since then. This melody of love, loss, and exile resonated with me—I too am unable to travel home to visit my elderly parents due to the pandemic. ;

;

;For lovers who are blocked in two cities, the mobile phone screen is something that arouses their infinite desire and is warmer than real life. In fact, this is also the relationship between most people and their mobile phones. Especially during the epidemic, people’s interactions with others and their understanding of the world come from mobile phones. The contradictions and conflicts in human nature also come from people's different interpretations of online messages. We all seem to be living on isolated islands in our mobile phones. The more attractive "reality" on the screen seems more "real" than life itself. The themes of love and loss, life and death are ancient and timeless, and my challenge was to give it a new screen narrative for today.

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Have you ever considered adding a paragraph about their love history? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Absolutely no flashbacks. This story is that these two people are always in different frames, and it wants you to be deeply moved by them. These are the rules I set for myself. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;In the era of the epidemic, two people can only use mobile phones What love words can a lover say during a video call? What excites you about the process of writing a screenplay? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Their conversations are actually very simple conversations, the most daily and common conversations. My husband and I often do this too. Video communication. These two people are in love. They video chat when they wake up in the morning, before going to bed at night, and while cooking and brushing teeth. They chat casually in separate places, but it makes people feel the joy and love of two people together. , this is my excitement point. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;What do you think of the emotional tone expressed in this story? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;This is a story about true love. If a person can love like this once, he is very lucky. Not everyone can love like this. Because he has had real happiness, and the sadness of loss is sublimated into the beauty in the black mirror. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Many people in the world are actually not satisfied with love in their hearts. So I believe it, but the desire and demand for love still seems very strong. ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;After we finished filming, several of the main creators climbed Xiangshan Mountain. After climbing to the top, they saw many people writing blessing signs. . I said let’s hang one too, and we wrote our blessings for the movie and hung it there. I looked through it carefully, and there were hundreds of tags, and there were countless love words in them. They were all "So-and-so loves so-and-so" and "So-and-so will be with so-and-so forever." More than half of them, you can Did you say that love is gone? impossible. When you fall in love, can you stop yourself? Even this bit of vitality is gone, and your life has been in vain. This thing is different from desire. It is really a gift from God to you. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Princess Sissi is the Empress of Austria. She has extremely happy resources and unlimited money, and her husband loves her very much. He has worshiped her and been obsessed with her all his life, but she is not happy. I don’t know how the paradox in life is formed. Is love the greatest value of happiness in life? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Yes, this is a gift. You don’t need to be good enough or work hard. You don’t need to do your homework. You don’t need to move bricks. You don't need anything, it will come to you. Maybe love won't be important in the future, I don't know, I can't imagine it. Why refuse such a gift? I can't imagine. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;The role starring Yi Yang Qianxi, at the beginning Is it just set at the age of two or three years after graduating from college? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Absolutely. We met in college, have been in love for four years, and are about to get married. He is the happiest young man after graduating from college. period. The simplest dream of having this simple college sweetheart is to get married, the girl can wear a wedding dress, and the boy can put a ring on her. The definition of disaster is when the simplest dreams are destroyed. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;From a distant perspective, love is a An ordinary story is about a man and a woman falling in love. Your film is set in a specific time and space. What happened in this love story? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Actually, movies are such a thing. There is no need to make sense, and there is no reason to make love. It’s not that you think this person is a good match for this person, that has nothing to do with it. I'm going to give you something that I believe you will believe. ;

;

;;

;

;Chen Chong directed a short film in "Her in the World", telling the story of a pair of lovers who were separated in two places during the epidemic. ;(Photo courtesy of interviewee);

;

;“I can see clues of my dishonesty”

;

; ;Southern Weekend:;;Have you studied directing in the United States? ;

;

;;Chen Chong:;;I studied TV production and took some directing classes, but that directing class was completely useless. In fact, film is an apprenticeship, and film school comes later. When the movie first started, everyone was learning on the spot, apprentice-style. The kind of learning from a master should be more useful. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;You directed the first film "Tianba" When you were young, you cut it yourself. By then, did you already have strong confidence to complete it? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;There is no strong self-confidence, only strong desire. I'm not a particularly confident person, and self-doubt is a big part of my thinking. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;But outsiders see that you have many successes, which proves that you Be qualified to do it yourself. ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;I will always think that it is a coincidence, that it is a misunderstanding, that it confuses people. I think so, In fact, this may be the case. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Have you ever gone to the cinema to watch your own movie? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Very few. I've seen it, but it's quite unbearable. I actually have a very sensitive radar. I can see the clues of my own dishonesty. Maybe others can’t see it, but I can definitely see it. So watching your own movies is not an easy task. Movies are not a tool for actors, but for directors, so you are a pawn in it, and if you see your own problems, it does not affect your feeling that the movie is pretty good. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;The films you directed are all because of yourself Do you have the desire to create, or do you have to find funds or outside sources? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Both. If funds come to me and I don’t have the desire, I will definitely not go. Because being a director is quite hard for me and not an easy thing. I am not a genius director, nor am I a technical director. I have limited talent and limited skills. If I don’t have a strong narrative desire, then I simply can’t do this. So you must have a strong narrative desire to do it. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;The movies you direct are all written by yourself ? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;I must, because it is not difficult for me. Of course I hope to get opinions and tips from like-minded creators, as well as a lot of information that everyone has worked on together, because I think information is the best thing for me to write a script. But the script is actually the movie I see in my mind when I close my eyes. I write it down first, and it will definitely change after all the main creators come in. But the first thing you write down is the movie you see in your head, so it's not that difficult. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;When was the first time you stood on the Oscar stage? ? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;"The Last Emperor". ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Did you feel a great sense of satisfaction at that moment? ? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;No, when I was young, I didn’t particularly care about work or these things. I only cared about falling in love. In fact, work gives me a chance to buffer, and it saves me from the whirlpool of emotions time and time again. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;You said that your main business at that time was negotiating When you are in love, do you now feel that those times were a waste? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;No waste. I don’t know what is wasteful. It may be a bit wasteful to keep doing things you don’t want to do. For example, if you are in love, if you do something you want to do, but that thing is ridiculous or wrong, or it brings you a lot of losses, I think it still cannot be considered a waste. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Have you ever been on stage? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;I don’t dare. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Why? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Because I am afraid of crowds, I am especially afraid of crowds. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;It is true that Chinese domestic movies rarely look older Do you have a female character with a solid concept? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Very few, too few, especially in the current film culture, which advocates youth, and the requirements and standards for women are still... You know it. Your richness, your soul, your complexity, it does not have a carrier, because your body is not accepted, where does it find its home? ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Do you subconsciously try to please female audiences when making movies? , consider what they think, and not offend them. ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Your responsibility is to be honest, your responsibility is not to please, your responsibility should be to express yourself. When I make movies, I never think about the fact that I should make movies about women. I don’t have that burden. ;

;

;"If you put this scene in a reality show, no matter how you perform it, it will be like chewing wax"

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Media reporters sometimes subconsciously connect your characters, such as Wanrong and Hong Rose. Maybe those strong people in the characters who can fight for their own rights think that They are feminist heroes, do you have that connection? ;

;

;;Chen Chong:;;When I was playing Wan Rong or in "Red Rose and White Rose", or in Jiang Wen's movie, I never thought about women. Rights, women's status, women's anything, were never considered. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;You filmed "Red Roses and White Roses" Did you like Zhang Ailing when you were young? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;I like Zhang Ailing, but I am not a Zhang fan. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Who do you like among female writers? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Marguerite Duras, who wrote "The Lover" and "Gone with the Wind" are some old ones, and Polish author Olga Tokarczuk is the 2018 Nobel Prize-winning writer. I especially like "Fireworks in March" written by Li Bihua. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;Lu Wei talks about the movie "Farewell My Concubine" , Li Bihua’s original novel is a second-rate novel. ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Sometimes a first-class novel really cannot change a movie. If you think about it, it is already first-class, what else can you do to it? It just takes second- and third-rate talent to turn it into a movie and take it to a higher level. I don't really like Li Bihua's books, but I read "Fireworks in March" and was very shocked. A friend gave it to me and I started reading it on the train. When I got to pages 60 and 70, I said it was a bit difficult and this was a bit too painful. She said if you persist, you will be rewarded. I persisted in reading it, and it was a great reward. Only long novels can give you such a sense of satisfaction. You can't get it anywhere else. It's satisfying but also regretful at the same time. Why did you finish reading it? It's so good. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;You wrote that when your daughter was 9 years old, The birthday gifts you want are books and swimming. Is this tradition of reading a result of your family environment when you were a child? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Actually, when I was a kid, I didn’t have many books or anything interesting to read. My grandma has a small box, which contains some things brought back from abroad, including some comic books and other biographies of Dong Cunrui and Jiao Yulu. There are actually very few things to read. My grandmother had a set of Chekhov's short stories, but they were no longer complete at that time, so I read them piecemeal. Because they like to read, and I also like to read. My mother stopped me from reading at that time because she thought it was not good and it was better to do some homework, do housework, and go out to play. My mother is a medical scientist. After retirement, she only reads novels. She likes to read novels. In the past two days, I have been looking at her bookshelf, which contains a wide range of Chinese and foreign books, including Wang Anyi, Chi Li, Chen Zhongshi, Nabokov's "Lolita" and Hemingway's "The Old Man and the Sea". ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;What is your own reading like? ? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;There is no standard thing. I have read some romance novels, for example. I was shocked when I read Marquez's book. My English was not good at that time. Not long after I arrived in the United States, I was very tired from reading "One Hundred Years of Solitude". I couldn't look it up in the dictionary and explain it to you with just one click. I was very confused. Tired and very slow. I was shocked. Is this what the book says? So it’s very, very complicated. I read it when I was in China. I don’t know where I found Kafka and also read it. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;What role does writing play in your life? proportion? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;Not a heavy proportion. During the epidemic, because we are locked up at home, having such a luxury is not the norm, and it does not mean that we have to write every day. But I love words, and I write when I’m in quarantine. I didn't study much when I was in elementary school or middle school. I went to Shanghai Film Academy less than one semester after middle school. I have never read any domestic classical books. The real education comes after studying abroad. ;

;

;;Southern Weekend:;;In recent years, there have been several domestic performances. Have you ever been to a reality show? ;

;

;;Chen Chong: ;;I participated in one and it didn’t make me die of embarrassment. Once in a show, someone was asked to play a scene in which I played Wanrong before, and then I was asked to comment on it. I said, how can I comment on this? I cannot comment on this, because countless masters have created such an environment and atmosphere for me. Without the magic of the movie itself, putting this scene in a live-action show would be like chewing wax no matter how you play it. ;

; Fri, 29 Sep 2023 16:25:03 +0800 20岁的她会是中国女子网球的希望吗？http://www.infzm.com/contents/257924

;

;On September 29, 2023, in the women’s singles tennis final of the Hangzhou Asian Games, Zheng Qinwen won 2 Defeated Zhu Lin 0-0 and won the championship ; (Visual China/Photo);

;

;The women's tennis at the Asian Games that ended on September 29, 2023 In the singles final, Chinese player Zheng Qinwen defeated teammate Zhu Lin in straight sets 6:2, 6:4 and won the gold medal in the women's singles tennis event at the Hangzhou Asian Games. This is the first time that 20-year-old Zheng Qinwen has participated in the Asian Games. With Zheng Qinwen and Zhu Lin winning both the championship and runner-up, the Chinese women's tennis team achieved its fifth consecutive Asian Games title.

;

;In May 2022, Zheng Qinwen reached the top 16 at the French Open, setting a new age for a Chinese female tennis player to reach the top 16 in a Grand Slam event, and attracted the attention of the world's tennis community. In the first half of 2023, her state had some ups and downs, but she recovered at the US Open and reached the top 8, once again setting a personal best. Zheng Qinwen, who only turned 21 in October this year, has just begun his career. The excellent results have given fans high expectations for this Hubei girl: After Li Na, the representative Chinese female tennis player, retires, will she, who is also from Hubei, be the next hope for Chinese women's tennis?

;

;;

;

;On September 29, 2023, Zheng Qinwen returned the ball in the women's singles tennis final of the Hangzhou Asian Games;(Visual China/Photo)< /span>;

;

;;"Rocket Girl";

;

;In September 2014, tennis player Li Na officially retired. In her 15-year career, she reached the WTA women's singles finals 21 times and won a total of 9 WTA and 19 ITF singles championships, including the 2011 French Open and the 2014 Australian Open women's singles championships. She is Asia's first Grand Slam women's singles champion. She was once ranked second in the world's women's tennis singles rankings, with a total career record of 503 wins and 188 losses. When she retired, she was ranked sixth in the world.

;

;Li Na's retirement has left an insurmountable peak and a huge vacuum for Chinese women's tennis. She has retired for more than nine years. At least so far, there has not been a player in Chinese women's tennis who can surpass her or even be on par with her.

;

;In 2011, when Li Na lifted her first Suzanne Langland Cup at Roland Garros in Paris, 9-year-old Zheng Qinwen was receiving tennis training in Wuhan under Li Na’s former coach Teacher Yu Liqiao. In her memory, it seemed that people all over the country were paying attention to Li Na's game that day. "Li Na's victory planted a dream in me. One day I will also win a Grand Slam."

;

;That was the third year that Zheng Qinwen officially started tennis training. In 2008, Zheng Qinwen's father took her to Beijing to watch the tennis match at the Olympic Games. Zheng Qinwen thought quietly. After the game, she and her father repeatedly discussed the details on the court and told her father that she was very interested in tennis. His father was once an athlete. He took Zheng Qinwen to play table tennis, badminton, basketball, and volleyball... His daughter was able to get started, but she was not outstanding. This time, he decided to let Zheng Qin play tennis. The coaches at Zheng Qinwen's hometown Shiyan Sports Center recognized her talent very much and believed that the power bursting out of her body was much higher than that of her peers.

;

;In September 2014, Zheng Qinwen participated in the 12-year-old category of the National Youth Tennis Ranking Tournament and won the singles and doubles championships in one fell swoop. In the same year, the Shiyan Tennis Team she led participated in the 14th Hubei Provincial Games and won 2 gold medals. Her serving speed reached 169 kilometers per hour, which was outstanding in the country and the world at that time. Therefore, she was hailed as a "genius girl" by many domestic sports commentators.

;

;Zheng Qinwen successfully entered the Beijing Wheel of Ingenuity Tennis School and received the guidance of Li Na’s mentor Carlos. Zheng Qinwen gradually grew from a talented player to a mature player with no shortcomings and comprehensive skills. In 2015, Zheng Qinwen won the championship in the 14-year-old group (12 to 14 years old) of the European Youth Tennis Tour. She has participated in many national and world tennis events and achieved outstanding results. When she was 16 years old, she participated in the French Open, Wimbledon, and US Open youth competitions, reaching the top 16 in each of them.

;

;In 2019, my father contacted Spanish male tennis player Pere Riba, who had just retired as a coach, and the two parties decided to cooperate. Zheng Qinwen started training in Spain under the care of his mother. From Monday to Saturday, he had 2 hours of tennis training in the morning, 1 hour of physical training, and 2 hours of tennis training in the afternoon.

;

;In August 2020, tennis competitions that were temporarily suspended due to the new crown epidemic resumed, and Zheng Qinwen began to participate frequently. In an interview with the media, Zheng Qinwen recalled that in order to more conveniently compete in Europe, the team would drive around Europe, driving from Barcelona to Germany, Italy and the Czech Republic. The furthest trip took 22 hours on the road. She didn't want to be eliminated in the first round and have to take a 22-hour drive home, so she worked very hard after playing. In order to maintain the best competitive condition, she hardly used the Internet during the competition, and even turned off her mobile phone when she arrived at the competition venue.

;

;In May 2022, 19-year-old Zheng Qinwen participated in the French Open for the first time. She defeated Zanievska, Halep, and Koné successively, reaching the top 16 of the tournament, refreshing China The youngest age for a female tennis player to reach the top 16 in a Grand Slam tournament. In the fourth round, she faced Swiatek, ranked No. 1 in the world and the last French Open champion. The first set took more than 80 minutes. Zheng Qinwen broke Swiatek's 37-day record of no opponent winning a single set. He won the "tiebreak" 7-5 and won the first set with difficulty. In the second set, Zheng Qinwen suffered from a right thigh injury that affected his performance. In the end, he lost 1:2 and missed the top 8.

;

;"Zheng Qinwen unfortunately stopped in the top 16 of the French Open, but the comprehensive skills and playing temperament she displayed made fans all over the world remember 'Chinese Zheng'. The potential shown by Zheng Qinwen makes us believe that this season She will also bring more surprises!" People's Daily reported.

;

;In 2020, when Zheng Qinwen first entered the professional arena, he was ranked 630th in the world. In the following more than two years, Zheng Qinwen won 8 ITF championships. He made history in his first Grand Slam tournament, reaching the second round of the Australian Open, the top 16 of the French Open, the top 32 of Wimbledon, and the top 32 of the US Open. WTA named him the "Best Rookie of the 2022 Season". Because of her extremely fast rise in rankings, Zheng Qinwen was called the "Rocket Girl". At the beginning of 2022, she promised to enter the top 30 in the world rankings, and at the end of the season, her ranking rose to 27th.

;

;;

;

;On July 23, 2023, in the women's singles final of the Women's Tennis Players Association (WTA) 250 Palermo Station, Zheng Qinwen defeated Italian player Paolini 2-1 and won The first tour championship in her career ;(Women's Tennis Players Association (WTA) official social account/picture);

;

;;"Queen Wen";

;

;When the new season starts in 2023, Zheng Qinwen vows to enter the top ten in the world rankings. In the first half of the year, she went through a difficult downturn. In the 2023 Australian Open and French Open, Zheng Qinwen failed in the second round one after another. Before the start of Wimbledon, Zheng Qinwen changed coaches, replacing Spanish coach Riba with famous Belgian coach Wim Fiset, who has coached Naomi Osaka, Azarenka and other famous players. However, the grass court season was still hard for her to win, and Wimbledon ended with a first-round trip.

;

;In an interview, Zheng Qinwen said: "Although I didn't play well in the grass-court season, I don't think my (strength) will decline. I will still work hard and prepare for the next stop. Change. The team must have had an impact, but I don’t think the loss was due to the coach.”

;

;Before participating in the US Open, Zheng Qinwen went to Italy to participate in the WTA250 Palermo Station. She went all the way and won her first WTA tour-level championship in her career, and began to get out of the slump. "This championship is hard-won. After experiencing failures, tears, regrets and disappointments, I finally tasted the taste of victory. I believe this is just the beginning."

;

;In a series of games before the US Open, Zheng Qinwen defeated Venus Williams and other famous players. After the start of the US Open, she quickly entered the state. Compared with before, she appeared calmer and more patient, with more swings and more frequent changes in long and short balls. She successfully broke into the top 16 of the US Open and expressed emotion in the interview: "At the beginning of the year, I thought that reaching the second week of a Grand Slam was a basic operation, but I didn't expect that I would not have such a result until the last Grand Slam of the year. ”

;

;After that, she defeated the 2022 tournament runner-up and No. 5 seed Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, creating the best Grand Slam record in her career and becoming the sixth woman in the Open era to enter the Grand Slam singles. /China Tennis Association players in the 4 finals. And this is only the second year that 20-year-old Zheng Qinwen has participated in a Grand Slam event.

;

;;

;

;On September 28, 2023, in the women's singles tennis semifinals of the Hangzhou Asian Games, Zheng Qinwen signed autographs for fans;(Visual China/Picture );

;

;Zheng Qinwen’s experience is a sample of the new generation of tennis players - he started playing tennis out of interest, received professional and international training since childhood, made independent choices, and did not take any detours. A relatively smooth growth process shaped her confident attitude and unruly temperament. During interviews, she often makes some sharp remarks. On August 12, 2022, in the third round of women's singles at the WTA1000 Toronto Station, Zheng Qinwen defeated Andreescu 7-5, 5-7, 6-2 and entered the quarterfinals of the WTA1000 competition for the first time. When asked if he would celebrate after reaching the top 8, Zheng Qinwen said: "I will only celebrate after winning. I will be sad if I don't win." After the game, he talked about the match with former US Open champion Andreescu. , Zheng Qinwen responded domineeringly: "I am stronger than her." When asked if he would work hard to win the US Open seed, Zheng Qinwen said: "It really doesn't matter. My philosophy has always been that no matter who my opponent is, I Just do your best and strive to win."

;

;Her speech became an indicator of the player's personality, and she was called "Queen Wen" by fans. At the US Open, fans called her "Queen Wen" from the sidelines. Zheng Qinwen enjoys this title very much, "Of course I know, I like the name Queen Wen very much. After all, this is the Queen!"

;

;More than half of the 2023 season has passed, and Zheng Qinwen is far from the top 10 in the world. There is still some distance. In an interview, she was asked why she always sets her goals very high, and why she always likes to speak out and take the initiative to withstand scrutiny from the outside world?

;

;;

;

;On September 4, 2023, in the fourth round of the women's singles match at the 2023 US Open, Chinese player Zheng Qinwen defeated Tunisian player Jabeul 2-0 and advanced to the eighth round. Qiang;(Xinhua News Agency/Photo);

;

;Zheng Qinwen replied: "Sometimes pressure is actually necessary and can motivate me to do better. . If there is no pressure and you always stay at the same level, you will not be able to keep moving forward. I play tennis because of my love. I hope that I am always in a state of progress. Top players are also constantly improving, which I admire very much. A little bit of them. I can’t imagine the pain it would cause me to stand still.”

;Cainiao launches self-operated local express delivery business in Spain. ;(Cainiao official website/picture);

;

;On September 26, 2023, Cainiao submitted IPO application documents to the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. This is Alibaba The first spin-off and listed business after launching the "1+6+n" organizational reform.

;

;The prospectus disclosed that Cainiao achieved 20% revenue in the fiscal years 2021, 2022 and 2023, as well as in the three months from March 30 to June 30, 2023 (hereinafter referred to as the most recent quarter). Revenue was 52.733 billion yuan, 66.867 billion yuan, 77.8 billion yuan and 23.164 billion yuan, and net profits were -1.688 billion yuan, -2.004 billion yuan, -2.325 billion yuan and 391 million yuan respectively.

;

;In other words, its cumulative losses in the three full fiscal years before listing exceeded 6 billion yuan, and it only turned a profit in the most recent quarter.

;

;Cainiao’s current business mainly includes three major sectors: international logistics, domestic logistics, technology and other services. From fiscal year 2021 to 2023 (ending March 30) and the most recent quarter, its international logistics revenue accounted for 55.1%, 52.3%, 47.4%, and 48.1% respectively, which are all higher than domestic logistics revenue.

;

;In 2013, Alibaba Group, Yintai Group, Fosun Group, Fuchun Group and other Zhejiang capital circle tycoons, together with domestic express logistics companies SF Express and "Three Communications and One Express" jointly established Cainiao . At that time, Shen Guojun, the founder of Yintai Group, was the CEO of Cainiao Network. However, just one year later, Shen stepped down as CEO and became vice chairman.

;

;Current CEO Wan Lin joined Cainiao in 2014. Previously, he served as a senior manager of Amazon’s global logistics department. In 2017, Wan Lin officially took charge of Cainiao and made Cainiao one of Alibaba's fastest-growing business segments. Thanks to this, Wan Lin appears on Alibaba’s latest list of partners disclosed in 2023.

;

;;Betting on the international market;

;

;Also in 2017, Cainiao’s overseas logistics ambitions began to emerge. This year, Cainiao launched its first e-Hub plan (comprehensive e-commerce logistics hub) in Kuala Lumpur, which became the gateway to the Southeast Asian e-commerce market. It mainly provides express delivery services for cross-border merchants on AliExpress.

;

;As of June 30, 2023, Cainiao has established two logistics hubs with an area of ​​over 15,000 square meters around the world, located in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia and Liège, Belgium. It is expected to build a third logistics hub in Hong Kong hub.

;

;Cainiao’s performance in cross-border logistics services is inseparable from Alibaba’s cross-border e-commerce AliExpress. AliExpress was established in 2010 and is known as the international version of "Taobao".

;

;A cross-border e-commerce practitioner in the women's clothing industry told Southern Weekend reporters that the platforms available on the market include Amazon, AliExpress, Shopee, Dunhuang, and E-bay. Due to their low cost, , early cross-border e-commerce entrepreneurs tend to choose AliExpress.

;

;Amazon has the fastest transportation speed due to its large number of overseas warehouses. The goods can arrive in major European and American countries in about a week, while in remote areas it takes half a month to a month. "After the express arrives at the local area, it still chooses to cooperate with the local post office, and the delivery time is determined by the local post office."

;

;Cainiao provides express services to AliExpress merchants in the form of third-party services. "For example, Di Sifang is owned by Cainiao express delivery company," she said. Tianyancha shows that Cainiao Network holds 45% of the shares in Shenzhen Di Sifang Information Technology Co., Ltd.

;

; According to the prospectus, in 2022, Cainiao’s international logistics service revenue will increase by 20% compared with the previous year, and the most recent quarter increased by 41% compared with the same period last year. The main reason is AliExpress’s cross-border express service Significant growth.

;

;In addition to serving the e-commerce platform within the Alibaba ecosystem, Cainiao has also established local logistics services in Hong Kong and some overseas markets such as Spain, France, Poland and other countries.

;

;The Chishi Consulting data cited in the prospectus mentioned that the compound annual growth rate of cross-border e-commerce logistics from 2018 to 2022 will exceed that of China. In particular, China’s cross-border e-commerce far exceeds cross-border e-commerce in other regions. business. Europe and the United States are expected to become the main destinations for cross-border e-commerce products from China. In addition, Southeast Asia and Latin America are also expected to grow rapidly.

;

;According to Zhuoshi Consulting, in 2022, Cainiao will become the world's largest cross-border e-commerce logistics company by package volume. Among the top five, there are two Chinese companies, Cainiao and EMS (China Postal Express Logistics), and the remaining three companies are from Germany, France and the United States.

;

;In the international market, Cainiao will also face challenges from SF Express and Jitu.

;

;Jitu, which was just listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on September 15, has also set its sights on the global market. Jitu is a logistics company born in Indonesia. As of 2022, its express delivery services cover 13 countries, with the highest market share in Southeast Asia.

;

;In August, SF Express announced that it would go public in Hong Kong for a secondary listing. Before the news was released, SF Express made a large-scale acquisition of 10 subsidiaries of Kerry Logistics that engage in express delivery services in the Asia-Pacific region and Europe.

;

;According to previous media reports, since 2019, SF Express has been making continuous progress in overseas expansion, and has successively invested in Flexport, a US freight logistics service provider, and 100% equity interests in two companies, DHL Hong Kong and DHL Beijing, owned by the German DHL company. Myanmar logistics company KOSPA Limited has also established a joint venture with Indonesian Triputra Group.

;

;;Build the world's largest logistics network;

;

; According to the Cainiao prospectus, the gross profit margin in the latest quarter has increased compared with the same period in 2022, rising from 10.6%. to 13.7%.

;

; Its operating costs mainly include contract fulfillment costs (transportation routes, distribution, warehousing processing and other procurement and management services, that is, third-party services) and labor costs. Labor costs include employee welfare expenses and outsourced labor services, which basically account for about 20%.

;

;In its prospectus, Cainiao used "the price of a cup of coffee to be sent around the world" to evaluate the solutions it provides in cross-border logistics.

;

;A cross-border e-commerce practitioner told Southern Weekend reporters that the price of sending a T-shirt is 20 to 30 yuan, which is almost the same as China Post, but compared with foreign logistics companies Lower cost.

;

;In addition to being cheap, the logistics solution provided by Cainiao for AliExpress merchants has also shortened the delivery time from one or two months to ten days, and some international express products only take five days.

;

;On the same day that Cainiao submitted its IPO report, AliExpress and Cainiao launched the "Global Five-Day Delivery" international express product, with the first batch landing in the United Kingdom, Spain, the Netherlands, Belgium and South Korea. In other words, consumers in these five countries can receive packages from China in just five days as long as they order products with the "five-day delivery" logo.

;

;The above-mentioned practitioners said that five-day delivery of goods requires merchants to provide package online information within 48 hours of the customer placing an order. If your Internet access rate reaches the standard, you can apply to join Five-Day Delivery, and the platform will automatically allow merchants to join. It is not difficult for merchants to achieve Internet access rates. Usually after a link is created, they will stock up on some goods. Buyers can send out orders as soon as they place an order, and rookies will come to collect goods every day.

;

;How to reduce costs and increase transportation speed?

;

;The prospectus quoted information from Chishi Consulting. Cainiao has established the largest logistics network in the world, including two logistics hub centers of over 15,000 square meters, more than 1,100 warehouses and more than 380 warehouses. Sorting center. In June 2023, there will be an average of about 170 charter flights and board flights per week, more than 2,700 transportation routes, more than 4,400 outlets and more than 17,000 stations.

;

;Technology is also playing a role. For example, artificial intelligence AI algorithms can improve sorting accuracy, improve inventory management, optimize route planning and vehicle scheduling, etc. In terms of smart hardware, there are RFID, smart IoT devices, automation and self-driving technologies, including AVG (automated warehousing technology) and the electric unmanned delivery vehicle "Little Man Donkey". At the same time, it also provides a digital supply chain to facilitate monitoring, identifying problems, and improving efficiency.

;

;In May 2023, the autonomous driving business of Alibaba Damo Academy was merged into Cainiao Group, and some personnel were transferred to Cainiao. That is to say, both "Damanlu" (self-driving truck) and "Xiaomanlu" Return to rookie. According to the prospectus, as of March 30, 2023, more than 800 Xiaoman Donkeys have been put into use, delivering more than 10 million packages.

;

;;

;

;Cainiao Global Headquarters. ;(Visual China/Picture);

;

;;Cannot live without Alibaba;

;

;Before IPO , Cainiao has gone through three rounds of equity financing. Alibaba Group holds a total of 69.54% of Cainiao's shares through three wholly-owned subsidiaries: Ali CN Investment, Ali KB Investment, and Alibaba International. Currently, Cainiao is still a subsidiary of Alibaba Group.

;

;Cainiao disclosed in detail its inextricable ties with Alibaba in its prospectus.

;

;Alibaba is Cainiao’s largest customer. From fiscal year 2021 to 2023 and the most recent quarter, revenue from Alibaba accounted for 29.2%, 30.8%, 28.2%, and 29.7% of total revenue respectively.

;

;Cainiao provides logistics services for multiple e-commerce platforms such as Tmall, Taobao, and AliExpress under the Alibaba ecosystem. After 2021, Cainiao will also serve merchants on well-known international e-commerce platforms and online channels (such as Kuaishou, etc.) outside the Alibaba system.

;

;The prospectus also states that due to the strategic synergy between Cainiao and Alibaba, Cainiao’s ability to maintain its ecosystem with Alibaba, or the development of Alibaba’s ecosystem itself, will have an impact on Cainiao.

;

;The existing resource cooperation between Cainiao and Alibaba Group has been fixed in the form of signing a business cooperation framework.

;

;Includes certain intellectual property rights related to certain software and technologies used by Alibaba and Cainiao in their respective business operations. Alibaba Group provides certain backend, administrative support and shared services to Cainiao. Alibaba Cloud provides basic cloud computing services to Cainiao, and Best Logistics provides freight services to Cainiao.

;

;Cainiao provides hardware and technical support services, warehousing and management services, comprehensive supply chain solutions and logistics services to Alibaba related parties.

;

;But in terms of management, rookies can still maintain a certain degree of independence.

;

;Among Cainiao’s eight board members, Cai Chongxin, Dai Shan and Jiang Fan are respectively the chairman of the board of directors of Alibaba, the CEO and board member of Taotian Group, and the CEO and board member of Alibaba International Digital Business Group. . These three people are all non-executive directors of Cainiao Group. They do not participate in daily business management and operations and only provide professional opinions and judgments.

;

;As the CEO of Cainiao Group, Wan Lin is also a member of the senior management of Alibaba Group, but does not hold other management positions in Alibaba Group. The remaining four members of Cainiao's board of directors also do not hold any positions in Alibaba Group.
